content: so please remember not to close any rounds with a slip_stitch otherwise you will have an ugly seam running through your carpet i made the photos only for the first 10 rounds you will find their bigger originals on my blog i also made videos for cable crossings this pattern comes with a chart on the last page feel free to consult it i will use the us crochet notation throughout this tutorial single_crochet single_crochet 4fpdc-decrease 4 front-post double_crochet single_crochet-increase 2 single_crochet in one stitch made together in round #48 double_crochet double_crochet only in round #6 chain chain fpdc front-post double_crochet slip_stitch in the last round only \\ crossing - https //www youtube com/watch v=tb06coad8kg // crossing - https //www youtube com/watch v=zeootzt0g9a if you feel your work is too tight try doing fptc s at every crossing one last thing if you have a thicker string than 3 mm or if you crochet very tightly then it may be better if you make 10 repeats of the pattern instead of 9 just try to do what is best for your style of work round #1 make 8 single_crochet in the magic loop pull the loop tightly and make the 9th single_crochet into the leg of the 1st single_crochet the 9th single_crochet will look somewhat sideways do not close the round with a slip_stitch not now and not ever p round #2 make 2 single_crochet an single_crochet-increase in each of the 9 stitches you have 18 single_crochet all around i repeat every time you want to close the round with a slip_stitch a small kitten cries somewhere magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #3 repeat 9 times single_crochet in the 1st single_crochet of the pair single_crochet-increase in the 2nd single_crochet of the pair you have 9* 1+2 =9*3=27 single_crochet all around round #4 repeat 9 times single_crochet-increase 2 single_crochet you have 9*4=36 single_crochet all around round #5 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 1 fpdc you have 9 fpdc separated by 3 single_crochet round #6 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet make in/around fpdc 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc you have 9 groups of 3 fp double_crochet separated by 3 single_crochet round #7 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 1 fpdc around the 1st fpdc around the double_crochet make 1 fpdc 1 chain 1 fpdc 1 fpdc around the last fpdc you have 9 groups of 4 fpdc with a chain in the middle separated by 3 single_crochet round #8 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 2 fpdc 1 single_crochet into chain 2 fpdc round #9 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #10 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet 2 fpdc round #11 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #12 repeat 9 times 3 single_crochet 2 fpdc skip single_crochet 2 single_crochet skip single_crochet 2 fpdc round #13 repeat 9 times 1 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 1
